HotelElement.Name: Courtyard by Marriott Barra de Tijuca

Description.Text: Adjacent to Rio Olympic Park, the heart of the Olympic Games 2016 Rio Centro, the largest convention center in Rio de Janeiro, is less than 2 miles away from hotel Attend a basketball game or a music concert at the HSBC Arena, just a short walk from the hotel.
The Bistro is available for a great breakfast, lunch, or drinks and dinner during the evening.
This accommodation has a medium lobby.
